short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delegate session management of selected domains to an Extensession Dashboard. The Dashboard operator will be able to copy, modify,â€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delegate session management of selected domains to an Extensession Dashboard. The Dashboard operator will be able to copy, modify, and erase sessions for the domains you allow. If you are not the operator, make sure you are not connected on your selected domains to sessions that you don't intend to share.
